name: KOBANE
description:
Enemies of humanity, radical islamics attacking your city. There are children, womens and old people in your city. You must save them from wild enemies that spreads blood, death and ignorance everywhere they go!

Enemies trying to enter your city by groups, you must break all their attacks. Be careful, you have to be calm and fast.

There are weapons and munutions, you can use those. Use thrifty, you can buy them only on certain times...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fire,Drag: Mouse left

Buy Item: Mouse Right

Change Weapon: 1,2,3

Reload: R

Get down: C

Go to the Menu,Pause: Esc

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This project is repaired prototype and it always will be updated till it has the most realistic type.

Please donate for me to offer better services(graphics, etc.) and for work in better conditions.

Thank you for choosing my project...

NEW IN THE NEXT UPDATES

-The player animations
